description: 'Documentation requirements and standards'

# Documentation Standards

## Code Documentation

- Use JSDoc for public APIs and complex functions
- Document business logic and RPG game mechanics clearly
- Explain non-obvious architectural decisions
- Comment on French-specific terminology and game concepts

## README Files

- Maintain French language for user-facing documentation
- Include clear setup instructions and dependencies
- Document feature roadmap and contribution guidelines
- Provide screenshots and usage examples

## Architecture Documentation

- Document feature-sliced design patterns and rationale
- Explain state management approach and context separation
- Describe data flow from repository to UI components
- Document CSS module conventions and global styling approach

## API Documentation

- Document repository function signatures and return types
- Explain mock data structure and Zod schemas
- Document DTO to domain mapping strategies
- Describe TanStack Query integration patterns

## Feature Documentation

- Document each feature's model/services/ui structure
- Explain business rules in implant.rules.ts and similar files
- Document Dreadcast game mechanics and stat calculations
- Maintain French terminology glossary for RPG concepts
